gov.nasa.ial.mde.util
Class ResourceUtil

java.lang.Object
  gov.nasa.ial.mde.util.ResourceUtil
Direct Known Subclasses:
LocalResourceResolver
public class ResourceUtil
extends Object

A utility for loading resources files, which could be located in a Jar file.

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Dan Dexter
